sections.heading: Sale or Conveyance of Medical or Dental Practice; Notice to State Board.Section 338.32 - Violation of Act; Misdemeanor.
sections.text:
Any person who sells, purchases or assumes the practice of any person licensed to practice medicine or dentistry in this state from the individual or his estate shall notify, within 10 days of sale, purchase or assumption, the state board which licensed or registered the practitioner, of the sale, purchase or assumption.

History:1965, Act 297, Eff. Mar. 31, 1966

sections.heading: Violation of Act; Misdemeanor.
sections.text:
Any person violating any provisions of this act shall be deemed to be guilty of a misdemeanor.

History:1965, Act 297, Eff. Mar. 31, 1966
